Class PoCustomReadCommandBuilder

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PoSendableInSession, SendableInSession<AbstractPoCommandBuilder>

    public class PoCustomReadCommandBuilder
extends org.eclipse.keyple.core.command.AbstractIso7816CommandBuilder
implements PoSendableInSession
    Class to build custom (non-referenced) read PO commands

    • Constructor Detail

      • PoCustomReadCommandBuilder

        public PoCustomReadCommandBuilder(java.lang.String name,
                                  org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.message.ApduRequest request)
        Constructor dedicated to the construction of user-defined commands. Caveat:
        • the caller has to provide all the command data.
        • Using this method bypasses the security and functional verification mechanisms of the PoTransaction API.

          It is done at the user's risk.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the command (will appear in the ApduRequest log)
        request - the ApduRequest (the correct instruction byte must be provided)
